subtitle: A very versatile recipe. The longer it simmers, the better it tastes.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Add the garlic, onion, pepper and chillies. Fry for 2-3 min until softened.
Stir in the chilli powder and cumin. Fry for 1 min.
Stir in the cumin seeds and minced beef. Fry together for 3-5 min, or until mince is browned.
Add the tomatoes, tomato puree, kidney beans, stock and seasoning. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 20 min, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, place the rice in a pan of boiling water. Bring to the boil. Cover and simmer for 15 min or until tender. Drain well. Mix in the remaining cumin seeds.
Spoon the rice into a warmed serving dish. Spoon the chilli in the centre.

title: Chilli and rice
